Salaries for Clerks
Colleges and Universities in the second division
usually employ at least two clerks. Higher salaries
and a better salary range are to be found for clerks
associated with the Public Schools and Boards of
education division. In moral, the average salary
for clerks in Public Schools and Boards or education

Student Assistants
Student Assistants play an important part in the
operation of almost all educational stations. Colleges
and Universities of both classifications employ an
average of nine students per station. Those institutions
of the first division average twenty-nine unpaid students
per station. Those institutions of the first division
average twenty-nine unpaid students per station. One
may possibly assume this tape of operation is less
efficient. True, in many instances, these students
are part of a training program or are assigned to
staff positions as part of their classroom work. A
further study of this problem certainly needs to be
made.
